meanings.definition: To take pleasure in; experience with joy
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the sunny day at the park.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The puppy enjoyed chasing its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The children enjoyed the playground like it was a magical kingdom.
meanings.sent5: He enjoyed the delicious ice cream on a hot summer day.

meanings.definition: To have the benefit of; use
meanings.sent1: They enjoyed the new technology in their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: The students enjoyed using the latest software for their project.
meanings.sent3: The family enjoyed the convenience of the new microwave oven.
meanings.sent4: She enjoyed the freedom of having her own car.
meanings.sent5: He enjoyed the comfort of the soft pillow on his bed.

meanings.definition: To have the use or benefit of; have as a possession
meanings.sent1: The company enjoyed a good reputation in the market.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the privilege of having a private office.
meanings.sent3: The team enjoyed the advantage of starting the game first.
meanings.sent4: She enjoyed the luxury of owning a yacht.
meanings.sent5: They enjoyed the beauty of the painting in their living room.
